message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1,750,000. I believe this price reflects its true value and provides you with a great opportunity.  Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I am not able to meet the price of $1,750,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,600,000. I hope this is within the range you are considering. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I understand your position. While $1,600,000 is closer to my desired price, it's still a bit below what I need to make this deal worthwhile. I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000. This reflects a fair compromise for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I am still unable to meet the price of $1,650,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,625,000. I hope this revised proposal will be acceptable to you.
